LanguageData.Cannibalism_Abhorrent.label: 혐오함
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Abhorrent.description: 식인은 매우 혐오스럽고 구역질 나는 행위다.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Acceptable.label: 수용함
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Disapproved.label: 못마땅함
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Horrible.label: 끔찍함
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Preferred.label: 선호
LanguageData.Cannibalism_Preferred.description: 인육 섭취는 고결한 행위이며, 살아가는 데에 필수적이다.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredRavenous.label: required (ravenous)
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredRavenous.description: Man-flesh is morality. To eat a meal without it is unthinkable.
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredStrong.label: required (strong)
LanguageData.Cannibalism_RequiredStrong.description: Consuming human flesh is important. It should be in every meal.
